title: Israel arrests new suspect behind Nomad Bridge $190M crypto hack
summary: An American-Israeli national named Osei Morrell has been arrested in Israel for his alleged involvement in exploiting the Nomad bridge smart-contract in August 2022 that allowed hackers to siphon $190 million. [...]
